remarks: Variation of ~ findcard2 requiring that the element added in the induction step not be a member of the original set.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 30-Nov-2012.)
statement:
findcard2s.1 $e |- ( x = (/) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
findcard2s.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
findcard2s.3 $e |- ( x = ( y u. { z } ) -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
findcard2s.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ta ) ) $.
findcard2s.5 $e |- ps $.
findcard2s.6 $e |- ( ( y e. Fin /\ -. z e. y ) -> ( ch -> th ) ) $.
findcard2s $p |- ( A e. Fin -> ta ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
